scene_description: The office is a rectangular room with silver walls and ceiling and a gray floor, organized around a central walkway. On the wall facing the viewer, a wide purple artwork dominates the right side, while a gray door sits just left of it; immediately to the door’s left is a small black-framed mirror, and a black ceiling light hangs overhead near this side with a second light toward the opposite end of the room. Along the opposite wall, two low shelves—black on the left and ivory on the right—stand side by side beneath a large teal‑green artwork, with another black shelf/tower tucked to their right. The left wall holds an ivory cabinet running low along the back portion, flanked farther forward by a pair of ivory shelving units, and a narrow black window is set higher in this wall between them. A tall tan shelf stands on the right side of the room nearer the foreground, while a maroon floor plant occupies the back‑right area; a slim gray artwork panel hangs on this right half of the space. Together, the neutral surfaces and furniture are accented by the teal and purple art pieces and the maroon plant, creating a balanced layout with storage concentrated along the perimeter and open floor area in the middle.
